# sormasr

## Overview

`sormasr` is an R client for the SORMAS API.

Pull data from SORMAS into R without logging into the SORMAS user interface.

`sormasr`, if used with Rmarkdown, quarto, Rshiny, etc., can improve routine reporting and data requests.

## Installation

You can install the development version of sormasr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("amanyiraho/sormasr")
```

## This is example one

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```r
library(sormasr)
## basic example code
```
